Wish I Was Here (2014)

Dutch
Het verhaal volgt de 35-jarige Aidan, een aan lager wal geraakte acteur.

In plaats van de reguliere lesstof, leert hij hen enkel nog de dingen die hij nodig vindt.

English
'Wish I Was Here' is the story of Aidan Bloom, a struggling actor, father and husband,
who at 35 is still trying to find his identity; a purpose for his life. He winds up trying
to home school his two children when his father can no longer afford to pay for private
education and the only available public school is on its last legs. Through teaching them
about life his way, Aidan gradually discovers some of the parts of himself he couldn't find.
